back.definition: Platform que automatiza response actions. Integrates tools (SIEM, EDR, firewall). Playbooks: IF alert THEN automated actions. Reduce MTTR.
back.example: Palo Alto Cortex XSOAR, Splunk SOAR, Microsoft Sentinel. Playbook: Phishing alert → Auto-isolate user → Scan email → Block sender → Notify SOC.

back.definition: Automated workflows. Trigger → Actions → Decision points. Codify tribal knowledge. Example: Ransomware playbook con steps from detection to recovery.
back.example: Ransomware playbook: 1) Detect (EDR alert) → 2) Isolate endpoint (auto-quarantine) → 3) Kill processes → 4) Block C2 IPs → 5) Alert Tier 2 → 6) Create ticket.

back.definition: SOAR connects disparate tools via APIs. Single pane of glass. Example: SIEM detects → SOAR queries threat intel → Blocks at firewall → Updates ticketing.
back.example: Target scenario: SOAR could auto-escalate FireEye alert → Query VirusTotal → If malicious → Isolate POS terminals → Alert management.

back.definition: SOAR tracks: MTTR, MTTD, alert volume, automation rate, false positive rate. Data-driven SOC improvement.
back.example: Before SOAR: MTTR 4 hours. After SOAR: MTTR 30 min (auto-containment). Automation handles 70% of alerts, analysts focus on complex 30%.

unlock_content.title: Automate Triage
points: Enrich alerts: Auto-query threat intel, WHOIS, geolocation
Context gathering: User recent activity, asset criticality
Severity scoring: ML-based prioritization
Auto-close: Known false positives (scanner IPs, approved maintenance)
Escalate: High-severity to human analyst
unlock_content.bonus_fact: 70% of Tier 1 work is automatable. Frees analysts for investigation.

unlock_content.title: Automated Response
points: Endpoint isolation: EDR auto-quarantine on malware detection
Account disable: Compromised user = auto-disable AD account
Firewall block: C2 IPs auto-added to block list
Email quarantine: Phishing detected = recall from all mailboxes
Colonial benefit: Auto-isolation could limit ransomware spread
unlock_content.bonus_fact: Manual containment: 30+ min. Automated: <1 min. Ransomware spreads fast.

unlock_content.title: Intelligence Automation
points: IP reputation: Auto-check VirusTotal, AbuseIPDB, internal history
Domain reputation: WHOIS age, category, threat feeds
File hash: Check against malware databases
User risk score: Aggregate risk indicators
Auto-escalate: High-risk indicators = priority alert
unlock_content.bonus_fact: Enrichment reduces investigation time 50%. Analyst has context immediately.

unlock_content.title: Automated Reporting
points: Daily SOC metrics: Alerts handled, MTTR, open investigations
Weekly executive summary: Trends, top threats, actions taken
Compliance reports: Auto-generate audit trails
Incident reports: Template population from SOAR case data
Target lesson: Automated reporting of FireEye alerts could show pattern of dismissals
unlock_content.bonus_fact: Manual reporting = hours/week. SOAR = minutes. Time saved for hunting.

Target example: SOAR could auto-escalate FireEye alerts con proper enrichment, reducing dismissals.
